column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " Korra ?
#Text=Our intel was wrong .
#Text=She must have known Zhu Li had the information .
#Text=" Raiko says : " What are you trying to say ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Kuvira 's army is only a few hours away .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No , they ca n't be !
#Text=We 're not ready .
#Text=" Korra says : " And that spirit weapon of hers is attached to a giant mecha suit .
#Text=It 's over twenty - five stories tall !
#Text=" Raiko says : " Get General Iroh on the line and tell him that the attack is happening today .
#Text=We need to lock down the city .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Pema !
#Text=Find Wu and get the remaining citizens to safety , immediately .
#Text=We ca n't have innocent lives in jeopardy .
#Text=" Bolin says : " What should we do ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Let 's go to my factory .
#Text=Maybe we can get a few of those hummingbird suits up and running .
#Text=" Suyin says : " We 're coming with you .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'll head to the front lines and help General Iroh .
#Text="
